class.name: posvel_controllers/JointTrajectoryController
class.description: The JointTrajectoryController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position-velocity interface.

class.name: posvel_controllers/JointGroupPosVelController
class.description: The JointGroupPosVelController tracks position-velocity commands for a set of joints. It expects a PosVelJointInterface type of hardware interface.
